raw

Login | POST https://e-commerce-api-john-smilga.herokuapp.com/api/v1/auth/login

Body
{ "email":"user2@test.ca", "password": "secret" }
raw

Register User | POST https://e-commerce-api-john-smilga.herokuapp.com/api/v1/auth/register

Body
{ "name": "user1", "email": "user1@test.ca", "password": "secret" }
raw

Register Admin | POST https://e-commerce-api-john-smilga.herokuapp.com/api/v1/auth/register

Body
{ "name": "user2", "email": "user2@test.ca", "password": "secret", "role": "admin" }

Logout | GET https://e-commerce-api-john-smilga.herokuapp.com/api/v1/auth/logout

Body
{ "name": "admin1", "email": "admin1@test.ca" }
raw

Body
{ "oldPassword": "secret1", "newPassword": "secret" }
